sections.heading: Time of filing; determinationUpon acceptance of an instrument the recorder shall immediately write upon or stamp it with the date and time it is filed and the registry number assigned to it
sections.text: Acts 2005, No. 169, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2006; Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13, ยง1, eff. Nov. 29, 2005.NOTE: Acts
